name: Ext_R3_Measure_su_criteria
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Measure.supplementalData.criteria for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Measure.supplementalData.criteria from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Measure|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Expression describing additional data to be reported
element.definition: The criteria for the supplemental data. This must be the name of a valid expression defined within a referenced library, and defines the data to be returned for this element.
element.comment: `Measure.supplementalData.criteria` maps to R4 `Measure.supplementalData.criteria`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
